title: Stress-induced stabilization of photoactive FAPbI3 phase in ambient conditions without using an additive approach

Formamidinium lead iodide (FAPbI3) as the absorber material has garnered significant interest due to its suitable bandgap for perovskite solar cell applications. Herein, a novel fabrication process is developed to...
